movie.title: Suffragette
movie.plot: Based on true events about the foot soldiers of the early feminist movement who were forced underground to evade the State.

events.title: the Le Mans race ends, 24 hours after it began

movie.title: Le Mans
movie.plot: Filmed during the annual 24-hour endurance race at Le Mans, Michael Delaney is a Porsche driver haunted by the memory of an accident at the previous year's race in which a competing driver was killed. Delaney also finds himself increasingly infatuated with the man's widow.

movie.title: The Taking of Flight 847: The Uli Derickson Story
movie.plot: This made-for-television film documents the takeover of the TWA airliner in flight from Athens to Rome in 1985. The focus is on the flight attendant, Uli Derickson, whose courage and hope helped save all but one of the passengers on the plane. The movie chronicles the first 2 days and the aftermath.
movie.awards: Nominated for 5 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

events.title: Cheryl Strayed begins her long walk along the Pacific Crest Trail

movie.title: Wild
movie.plot: A woman with a tragic past decides to start her new life by hiking for one thousand miles on the Pacific Crest Trail.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 67 nominations.
